MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the TD4 postcode area of Earlston. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 6:20am. Our engineers have arrived onsite at the Summerfield Terrace substation and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:35am on 9th April
